comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/jamica1] Thanks for the link to the ship's logs jamica1, what a resource! You are correct, this was taken in April 1924.

comment._content: From North Head with a zoom lens, or a low-flying biplane.  Mr Hood seemed to like being high up.
